text: Have you tried using GraphiQL to verify the data scheme you are using?

Hi all I know this is probobly a basic questions but i have a client who has CMS Enterprise and wants to build a login portal that would allowed their premium users a dashboard view of some of their CRM data. he would present process and present some of their own financial info which is all stored in the cms. is this possible through private pages with logins on CMS enteprise or should I look for a 3rd party solution on this?

Custom objects generated in your schema will have the prefix `p_` so try `p_facility_collection`. As Martin suggested, you can also use GraphiQL (<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/graphiql>) to verify your schema.
<@U04L8B6J95G> I see that you were dealing with potentialy the same issue. displaying diffrent pages to each user. did you manage to solve this?
And with that its possible build this sort of dashboard design with contact specific crm content?
Thanks a lot! Have been searching for hours. Really helpful
<@U05CAJG8D98> i can't see where you are referencing at. Do you reply to a comment of mine?
